bug.author: fireant
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>Description</denchmark-h>
The master branch doesn't have the cpp-package directory. It seems in June this was removed? <denchmark-h:h3>Error Message</denchmark-h>
The C++ package is not built. USE_CPP_PACKAGE is not used in the cmake script. <denchmark-h:h2>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
Try to build with the c++ package from master.

comments.comment: Welcome to Apache MXNet (incubating)! We are on a mission to democratize AI, and we are glad that you are contributing to it by opening this issue. Please make sure to include all the relevant context, and one of the @apache/mxnet-committers will be here shortly. If you are interested in contributing to our project, let us know! Also, be sure to check out our guide on <denchmark-link:https://mxnet.apache.org/community/contribute>contributing to MXNet</denchmark-link> and our <denchmark-link:https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/MXNET/Developments>development guides wiki</denchmark-link> .

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/pribadihcr>@pribadihcr</denchmark-link> you will need to use the branch. If you are interested in helping to update the CPP package for the master branch that would be very welcome. (It needs update due to deprecation of some underlying APIs in master)
